
```{r }
t <- read_csv("./new/tidyPE462_abundances_calc_w.csv")
unique(contr$polymer)
contr <- t %>% filter(polymer %in% c("Glass_fiber","mock_DNA","Neg_PCR"))
write_csv(contr, "./new/PE462_controls.csv")
pet <- t %>% filter(polymer %in% c("PET", "PET_wood"))
unique(pet$polymer)
write_csv(pet, "./new/PE462_PET.csv")
pe <- t %>% filter(polymer %in% c("PE", "PE_wood"))
unique(pe$polymer)
write_csv(pe, "./new/PE462_PE.csv")
ps <- t %>% filter(polymer %in% c("PS", "PS_wood"))
unique(ps$polymer)
write_csv(ps, "./new/PE462_PS.csv")
Nylon <- t %>% filter(polymer %in% c("Nylon", "Nylon_wood"))
unique(Nylon$polymer)
write_csv(Nylon, "./new/PE462_Nylon.csv")
```
